allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add blog page with shadcn components and enhance Builder.io integration

- Add new blog section with article layout and prose styling
- Add Shadcn UI components: alert, avatar, breadcrumb, separator
- Install @tailwindcss/typography plugin for rich text content
- Add date-fns for date formatting
- Install required Radix UI dependencies
- Enhance Builder.io registry with organized insert menu sections
- Add comprehensive prose CSS styles for article content
- Update project documentation with commit guidelines
EOF
)")
